attributes.action: give John Wick a knighthood in the new years honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: John Wick passed information about MPs expenses to the Daily Telegraph and deserves recognition for his public service.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
